name: fdm_machine_common
machine_start_gcode:
;v1.5

M140 S60 ; preheat hotbed for reducing wait 
G28 X Y ; X and Y homing
M104 S240 ;heat nozzle to 240 for washing nozzle
G90 
G1 Z3
G1 X10 Y-2.5 F3000 
G90
G1 Z3  
G1 X110 Y-2.5 F4000 ;move head to wait position
G1 Z3
M109 S240 ;wait nozzle temperature
G92 E0 ;reset extruder
G1 E15 F300 ;extrude filament
G1 E-4.0 F3600 ;retract filament
M104 S130 ;wait nozzle temp down for wiping nozzle
M106 S255 ;turn on head_auxi fan
G4 P4000 ;wait cooling nozzle 

;************wiping nozzle start*************
G1 X150 Y-0.5 F4000
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=255 
PROBE SAMPLES=2 SAMPLE_RETRACT_DIST=2
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=0 
;G92 E0
;G1 E-4.0 F3600
G1 X130 Y-0.5 F200
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=255 
PROBE SAMPLES=2 SAMPLE_RETRACT_DIST=2 
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=0
G1 X110 Y-0.5 F200
M106 S255 
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=255 
PROBE SAMPLES=2 SAMPLE_RETRACT_DIST=2 
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=0
G1 X100 Y-0.5 F100 
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=255 
PROBE SAMPLES=2 SAMPLE_RETRACT_DIST=2 
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=0
G1 X90 Y-0.5 F100
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=255 
PROBE SAMPLES=2 SAMPLE_RETRACT_DIST=2 
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=0
G90
G1 Z0
G1 X60 Y-0.5 F100
;*************wiping nozzle end*************

M106 S0 ;close head_nozzle fan
G90
G1 Z2

;*************preheat nozzle and hotbed for Z_TILT_ADJUST*************
M140 S60
M109 S130
G1 X110 Y110 F3000 
G4 P200
probe
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=0 ;Z homing
Z_TILT_ADJUST 
;*************Z_TILT_ADJUST end*************

G90
G1 Z2
G4 P200
G1 X110 Y110 F3000
G4 P200
probe
SET_KINEMATIC_POSITION Z=0 ;Z homing
G28 X Y ; x y homing
G1 X-3 Y2 Z3 F5000.0 ;move head to wait position for waiting print start
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ;heat hotbed temp set by user
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ;heat nozzle temp set by user
PRINT_START ;print start
;*************PRINT START*************
